module.name: LDockCtrlEdit
module.short: This unit contains a dialog to dock or undock a control to another

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg
element.short: TLazDockControlEditorDlg - a dialog to control the docking or undocking of a control with another

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.CancelButton
element.short: CancelButton - hitting this button cancels the action

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockControlComboBox
element.short: DockControlComboBox displays the various actions for selection

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockPageButton
element.short: DockPageButton - a SpeedButton for moving the whole page

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockBottomButton
element.short: DockBottomButton - a SpeedButton for docking the bottom border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockTopButton
element.short: DockTopButton - a SpeedButton for docking the top border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockRightButton
element.short: DockRightButton - a SpeedButton for docking the right border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockLeftButton
element.short: DockLeftButton - a SpeedButton for docking the left border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockGroupBox
element.short: DockGroupBox - a GroupBox to contain the docking buttons

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockControlLabel
element.short: DockControlLabel - a label for the dock control

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.UndockButton
element.short: UndockButton - a buton for undocking the control

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.UndockGroupBox
element.short: UndockGroupBox - a box to contain the undock button and any associated elements

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockBottomButtonClick
element.short: DockBottomButtonClick - method for responding to a click on the DockBottomButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockControlComboBoxEditingDone
element.short: DockControlComboBoxEditingDone - method invoked when editing of the ComboBox is done

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockLeftButtonClick
element.short: DockLeftButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the DockLeftButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockPageButtonClick
element.short: DockPageButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the DockPageButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockRightButtonClick
element.short: DockRightButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the DockRightButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DockTopButtonClick
element.short: DockTopButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the DockTopButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.FormCreate
element.short: FormCreate - method for creating the dialog form

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.UndockButtonClick
element.short: UndockButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the UndockButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.DlgResult
element.short: DlgResult - the result of the dialog: shows whether a moving button, an enlarging button or another control was pressed

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.CurrentControlName
element.short: CurrentControlName - the name of the current control (the one being docked)

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeGroupBox
element.short: EnlargeGroupBox - a GroupBox to contain the Enlarge buttons

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeLeftSpeedButton
element.short: EnlargeLeftSpeedButton - a SpeedButton for enlarging the docking control by moving the left border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeRightSpeedButton
element.short: EnlargeRightSpeedButton - a Speedbutton for enlarging the docking control by moving its right border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeTopSpeedButton
element.short: EnlargeTopSpeedButton - a SpeedButton for enlarging the docking control by moving its top border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeBottomSpeedButton
element.short: EnlargeBottomSpeedButton - a SpeedButton for enlarging the docking control by moving its bottom border

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeBottomSpeedButtonClick
element.short: EnlargeBottomSpeedButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the EnlargeBottomSpeedButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeLeftSpeedButtonClick
element.short: EnlargeLeftSpeedButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the EnlargeLeftSpeedButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeRightSpeedButtonClick
element.short: EnlargeRightSpeedButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the EnlargeRightSpeedButton

element.name: TLazDockControlEditorDlg.EnlargeTopSpeedButtonClick
element.short: EnlargeTopSpeedButtonClick - method to respond to a click on the EnlargeTopSpeedButton
